name: Run Duck Run
description:
In a world where ducks can't fight back this Duck decided it had enough!

A short and fun shooter who can be enjoyed by everyone.

If you have any problems with the game leave a comment

1.1.2:
      - added music in help screen
      - fixed bug with resolution

1.1.1:
      - added help in menu

1.1.0:
      - made the map bigger
      - added more enviroment 
      - fixed the bug with pause  
      - added new cursors
1.0.5:
      - added icons to know where items are available
      - fixed a bug(can't pick up another weapon if you have one already)
      - when you pick up a weapon and already have it the timer reset

1.0.4:
      - added shotgun
      - added timer to the shotgun
      - changed the time guns spawn (old:45s/now:30s)
1.0.3:
      - fixed the bug where enemies won't spawn
      - changed the timer to the rifle (old:50s/now:45s)

1.0.2:
      - added new gun (rifle)
 - you can hold the mouse and shoot with the rifle only now
 - added a timer to the rifle (50s)

1.0.1:
      - added ammo management
 - added pickable ammo crate
 - fixed a bug who allowed you to shoot before the game started

1.0.0:  //FIRST STABLE VERSION IS HERE
      - added new health bar
      - added main menu button from paused game
      - optimized the game

0.9.9:
      - added the option to hold down the mouse button and shoot
      - the lives have a timer now
      - fixed the bug where you could get out of the map
      - improved the movement

0.9.8:
      - added damage indicators
      - fixed some enemies bugs
      - optimized the game 

0.9.7:
      - increased the speed of enemies
      - changed the position of trees
      - fixed the collider on some trees
      - added better bullet model
      - adjusted the camera

0.9.6:
      - fixed the start button
      - reduced the spawn speed of new lives (old:50s/now:25s) 

0.9.5 : 
       - added a new start
